allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 2: Sparkasse Connector \(FinTS/HBCI\)

Backend:
- Add lib-fints library for FinTS 3.0 protocol
- Create base connector interface and types
- Implement SparkasseConnector with FinTS authentication
- Support TAN methods: pushTAN, photoTAN, smsTAN, chipTAN
- Parse MT940/CAMT transaction formats
- Add connector manager for lifecycle management
- Update server endpoints to use real connectors

Frontend:
- Add credentials dialog for secure login
- Update connector service to send credentials
- Improved MFA flow with status polling

Features:
- Real FinTS/HBCI connection to Sparkasse banks
- Multiple TAN method support including decoupled
- Transaction fetching with date range
- Duplicate detection on import
- Regional Sparkasse endpoint mapping

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript errors in Sparkasse connector

- Add beneficiary and source fields to StoredTransaction interface
- Fix saveTransaction to use Omit<StoredTransaction, ''timestamp''>
- Fix lib-fints type compatibility:
  - Use local TAN_MEDIA_* constants instead of TanMediaRequirement enum
  - Change selectedTanMethodId from string to number
  - Fix upd.accounts to upd.bankAccounts
  - Fix account property names \(ownerName -> holder1\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
